arts.ttl: Tohumcu's late strike salvages a point for Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Under fire head coach Matarazzo Pellegrino and his Hoffenheim side welcomed French opposition in the form of Olympique Lyon to the Rhein-Neckar Arena tonight. An injury-time leveller from Umut Tohumcu sealed parity at 2-2.

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Hoffenheim: Alexandre Lacazette and Malick Fofana to drop to bench
arts.sum: Pierre Sage is expected to rotate his side as Olympique Lyonnais prepare to face Hoffenheim in the UEFA Europa League on Thursday. Two key attackers in the form of Malick…

arts.ttl: Matarazzo says Lyon clash will be a "special game"
arts.sum: Speaking at today's press conference ahead of Hoffenheim's Europa League clash with Olympique Lyonnais, manager Pellegrino Matarazzo gave his thoughts.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt interested in Hoffenheim’s Tom Bischof
arts.sum: Bild reports that Eintracht Frankfurt are interested in Hoffenheim’s highly-rated youth midfielder Tom Bischof as his contract expires in the summer. Bischof has become a regular for Hoffenheim this season featuring…

arts.ttl: Frankfurt among reported suitors for Hoffenheim starlet with expiring contract
arts.sum: According to Bild, Eintracht Frankfurt are interested in signing Hoffenheim prospect Tom Bischof, who is out of contract this summer.
